conclusion: To solve this problem, we need to understand the flow of liquid through the baffles and determine which container (E or F) the liquid will flow into.

The liquid from each source is directed by the baffles towards either container E or F.

The liquid from B is directed by the white baffle towards container F.
The liquid from C is directed by the blue baffle towards container E.

conclusion: Based on the direction of the baffles, the liquid from A and C will flow into container E.
